data.system_settings: MacBook Pro (13", Mid-2012), macOS 10.13.6 - iPhone 6s, iOS 12 Public Beta 12 (16A5366a)
data.actual_result: The unsaved changes bar doesn't disappear despite the PATCH request being successful.
data.expected_result: The save should be successful and allow you to exit the server settings panel.
data.short_description: When deleting the currently selected AFK channel, you can't save changes despite the request being successful.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server where you have Manage Server, and Manage Channels. - Create a voice channel on that server on a mobile device of choice. - On desktop, open the server settings panel for the server. - In the AFK Channel settings, select the voice channel you just created. DO NOT SAVE YET! - On the mobile device, delete the channel you selected. - The dropdown on desktop will now say "Select...". - Open Dev Tools. (ctrl+shift+i, or cmd+alt+i) - Open the network tab in devtools. - Click save changes. - Observe how the request made succeeds with code 200.
